<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"
	})
})()
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];

        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
  book_id,
  source: sources,
  tab,
  book_tts,
  tags,
  role,
  last_chapter_title,
  last_chapter_update_time,
  word_number,
  status,
  score,
  abstract,
  copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
  proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
  proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
  let cookieValue =
    String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
  key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
  key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
  java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
  let cookieValue;
  for (let h of host) {
    try {
      cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
      key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
      key = "";
    }
    if (key) {
      java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
      //java.log(cookieValue)
      removeCookie(h);
      removeCookie(base_url);
      cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
      break;
    }
  }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
  book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}
let loginStatus = key ? "✅ 已登录" : "⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录";

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 账号状态：${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
  let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
  if (isValid(book_tts)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
  }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
  if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
  let indentedAbstract = abstract
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
    .join("\n");
  info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
  info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
  info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
  info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
  info = String(info)
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
    .join("\n");
} else {
  basicInfo = "";
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
  addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
  addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
  addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
  if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
      .split("\n")
      .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
      .join("\n");
    basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
  } else {
    basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
  }
  info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  var parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}`
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
function setArgument(key, value) {
    var open_argument = source.getVariable();
    open_argument = getArguments(open_argument, '') || {};
    open_argument[key] = value;
    var result = JSON.stringify(open_argument);
    source.setVariable(result);
    return result;
}

function getFanqieCookie() {
    try {
        return String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || '');
    } catch (e) {
        return '';
    }
}

function getSessionId(cookieString) {
    const match = cookieString.match(/sessionid=([^;]+)/);
    return match ? match[1] : null;
}

var open_argument = source.getVariable();
var base_url = getArguments(open_argument, 'server') || '';
var ms = getArguments(open_argument, 'tone_id') || '';
var source_type = getArguments(open_argument, 'source_type') || '男频';
var tab = getArguments(open_argument, 'media') || '小说';
var sources = getArguments(open_argument, 'source') || '番茄';


var sdtoken;
try {
    var loginInfoMap = source.getLoginInfoMap ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {};
    sdtoken = String(loginInfoMap['手动填写番茄token(可不填)'] || '');
} catch (e) {
    sdtoken = '';
}

var rawCookie = getFanqieCookie() || sdtoken;
var match = rawCookie.match(/sessionid=[^;]+/);
var fqcookie = match ? match[0] : '';
var fqssionid = '';
if (!fqcookie) {
    java.toast('您还未登陆番茄账号，无法同步数据哦！');
} else {
    fqssionid = getSessionId(fqcookie)
}
var fqsjurl = base_url + "/bookshelf?page={{page}}&ssionid=" + fqssionid;

var groupDatas = [];
var infoData = [];

function deviceType() {
    try {
        return !!java.androidId();
    } catch (e) {
        return false;
    }
}

var hasValidCookie = fqcookie.length > 0;

if (hasValidCookie) {
    function groupQuery() {
        try {
            var url = base_url + "/group_name?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
            var res = java.ajax(url);
            var response = JSON.parse(res);

            if (!(response && response.data)) {}

            response.data.forEach(function(group) {
                var keys = Object.keys(group);
                if (keys.length > 0) {
                    var key = keys[0];
                    var value = group[key];
                    if (value && value.length) {
                        var option = {
                            "method": "POST",
                            "body": {
                                "book_ids": value,
                                "page": "{{page}}"
                            }
                        };
                        groupDatas.push({
                            title: key,
                            url: base_url + "/bookshelf," + JSON.stringify(option),
                            style: {
                                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                                layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            });

            if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    title: "--",
                    url: "",
                    style: {
                        layout_flexGrow: 1,
                        layout_flexBasisPercent: 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        } catch (e) {
            java.longToast("分组获取失败: " + e.message);
        }
    }

    try {
        java.longToast("正在加载分组数据...");
        var userUrl = base_url + "/fquser?ssionid=" + fqssionid;
        var userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
        var userData = JSON.parse(userRes);

        var userName = (userData && userData.data && userData.data.name) ? userData.data.name : '未知用户';
        infoData = [{
            title: userName + "个人中心",
            url: fqsjurl,
            style: {
                layout_flexGrow: 1,
                layout_flexBasisPercent: 1
            }
        }];

        groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
        java.longToast("操作失败: " + e.message);
    }
}

var style_list = [];
try {
    var durl = `${base_url}/discovestyle?source=${sources}&source_type=${source_type}&tab=${tab}`;
    var res = java.ajax(durl);
    var result = JSON.parse(res);
    style_list = result.data || [];
    if (result.msg) {
        java.toast(result.msg);
    }
} catch (e) {
    java.toast("发现样式获取失败");
}

var finalData = infoData.concat(groupDatas, style_list);
JSON.stringify(finalData);
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
let {
  book_id,
  source: sources,
  tab,
  book_tts,
  tags,
  role,
  last_chapter_title,
  last_chapter_update_time,
  word_number,
  status,
  score,
  abstract,
  copyright_info
} = result;
let proxy = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "proxy");
if (proxy == "本地") {
  proxy = "本地网络";
} else {
  proxy = "服务器网络";
}
java.put("book_detail", JSON.stringify(result));

let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let key = "";
try {
  let cookieValue =
    String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
  key = getKey(cookieValue);
} catch (e) {
  key = "";
}

if (key == "") {
  java.log("当前服务器未查询到登录状态，尝试查询其他服务器登录状态...");
  let cookieValue;
  for (let h of host) {
    try {
      cookieValue = String(cookie.getCookie(h)) || String(java.getCookie(h));
      key = getKey(cookieValue);
    } catch (e) {
      key = "";
    }
    if (key) {
      java.log(`已在${h}登录，退出查询，正在转移登录状态到当前服务${base_url}`);
      //java.log(cookieValue)
      removeCookie(h);
      removeCookie(base_url);
      cookie.setCookie(base_url, cookieValue);
      break;
    }
  }
}

if (book.readConfig == null || book.readConfig.useReplaceRule == null) {
  book.setUseReplaceRule(false);
}
let loginStatus = key ? "✅ 已登录" : "⚠️ 未登录 | 点击右上角 🔖 登录";

let lightDivider = "❇️───────❇️───────❇️";
let heavyDivider = "‎\n‎";

let isValid = (value) => String(value).length > 1;

let info = `
    📡 当前服务：${base_url}
    🔑 账号状态：${loginStatus}
    🏷 数据来源：${sources}
    🔄 当前模式：${tab}
    ⚙️ 访问模式：${proxy}
`;

if (tab == "听书") {
  let toneId = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
  if (isValid(book_tts)) {
    info += `${lightDivider}
    🎵 音色配置：${toneId}
    ${book_tts}
`;
  }
}

let basicInfo = "";
let addBasicInfo = (value, prefix, icon) => {
  if (isValid(value)) basicInfo += `    ${icon} ${prefix} ${value}\n`;
};

addBasicInfo(tags, "书籍分类：", "🌈");
addBasicInfo(role, "书籍主角：", "👑");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");

if (basicInfo) info += `${lightDivider}\n${basicInfo}`;

if (isValid(abstract)) {
  let indentedAbstract = abstract
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
    .join("\n");
  info += `${heavyDivider}
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
} else {
  info += `${heavyDivider}`;
}

if (isValid(copyright_info)) {
  info += `${lightDivider}
    © ${copyright_info}
`;
} else {
  info += `${lightDivider}`;
}

info += `
${heavyDivider}
    💠💠💠 数据更新于 ${new Date().toLocaleString()} 💠💠💠
`;
let jjinfo = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "info");

if (jjinfo != "on") {
  info = String(info)
    .split("\n")
    .map((line) => line.replace(/^ {4}/, ""))
    .join("\n");
} else {
  basicInfo = "";
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_title, "最新章节：", "📚");
  addBasicInfo(last_chapter_update_time, "更新时间：", "⏳");
  addBasicInfo(word_number, "书籍字数：", "📊");
  addBasicInfo(status, "书籍状态：", "🚩");
  addBasicInfo(score, "书籍评分：", "⭐");
  if (isValid(abstract)) {
    let indentedAbstract = abstract
      .split("\n")
      .map((line) => `    ${line}`)
      .join("\n");
    basicInfo += `
    \n‎
    📖 书籍简介：
${indentedAbstract}
`;
  } else {
    basicInfo += `${heavyDivider}`;
  }
  info = `‎\n🏷 数据来源：${sources}\n` + basicInfo;
}
</js>

  };

let item_id = res.item_id;
let tab = res.tab;
let title = res.title;
let sources = res.sources;
let url = res.url;

  html = java.ajax(url);
  //java.log(html);
}
let content = "";

let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "tone_id");
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(), "server");
let device, device_type;
try {
  device = java.androidId();
  device_type = "安卓";
} catch (e) {
  try {
    device = java.deviceID();
    device_type = "苹果";
  } catch (e) {
    device = "";
    device_type = "安卓";
  }
}

  method: "POST",
  body: { html: html },
  headers: { cookie: cookie.getCookie(base_url) },
};
op = JSON.stringify(op);

data = java.ajax(base_url + content_url);

	data = JSON.parse(data);

    java.toast(data.msg);
  }
} catch (e) {}
content = data.content;
content = decrypt(content);
if (sources == "番茄" && cache.get("fqpara") == "on" && tab == "小说") {
  content = getComments(content, book_id, item_id);
}
data = JSON.stringify({
  content: content,
});
//java.log(decrypt(data.content));
if (device_type == "安卓" && (tab == "短剧" || tab == "视频")) {
  data = {
    content: `【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`,
  };
  data = JSON.stringify(data);
  if (book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index) {
    let video_url = `${base_url}/online_video?book_id=${book_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}`;
    java.startBrowser(video_url, title);
    java.toast("正在加载视频...");
  }
}
data;
</js>

      .split("&")
      .map((query) => query.split("="))
  );
  res.url = "";
}

);

  device = java.androidId();
  device_type = "安卓";
} catch (e) {
  device_type = "苹果";
}

if (tab == "小说") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 0;
  }
} else if (tab == "听书") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 32;
  } else {
    book.type = 1;
  }
} else if (tab == "漫画") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 64;
  } else {
    book.type = 2;
  }
} else if (tab == "短剧") {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 3;
  }
} else {
  if (device_type == "安卓") {
    book.type = 8;
  } else {
    book.type = 0;
  }
}
data;

searchUrl:
<js>
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server');
let media;
let sources = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'source');
if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media');
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  var parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&page={{page}}`
</js>

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

bookSourceComment:
1.请使用3.25发布版阅读app
2.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
3.需要登录，各个域名登录状态相互独立
4.可在登录ui界面查看当前使用域名与登录状态，可切换域名、测试延迟
5.请不要更改源域名，会使已缓存小说丢失
6.可通过登录UI验证
7.防倒卖，请在登录UI界面输入作者名：tlyanyu

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if( String(chapter.baseUrl).indexOf(Get("url")) !== -1 ){
var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
else{
newUrl = Get("url") + chapter.url;
chapter.baseUrl = newUrl;
html = java.ajax(newUrl);
document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html);
limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box");
if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) {
  	document.select("div.line");
} else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){
        result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证";
}
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
let catalog = document.select("ul.catalog_ul");
let atag = catalog.select("a");
let url0 = Get('url') + atag.attr("href");
let html0 = java.ajax(url0);
let document0 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(html0);
document0.select("li.child, li.menu, div.volume_title_box");
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let sleep = Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep;
let tim = Math.floor(Math.random()*401);
sleep(600-tim);
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
urlo=baseUrl;
}else{
urlo=java.hexDecodeToString(result);
};
result=java.get(urlo,{	'user-agent': ui}).body();
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
intro=` 
📖 书名：{{@@span.1@text##.*《|》}}
👤 作者：{{@@span.2@text##作者：}}
🔖 标签：{{@@div[style="line-height:2;"]@text##标签：}}
🕰 最新：{{@@.divbg@li.0@a@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@.tabvalue.0@text##\s}}
⭐ 属性：
{{@@tbody.0@tr.1:2@td@text}}`
if(x>1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
pi=`${urldn}modules/article/reviews.php?aid=${p}&page=${x}`
po=java.ajax(pi)
r2=String(java.getString('#jieqi_page_contents>.c_row@html',po));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}else if(x==1){
let pl = '\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新';
r2=String(java.getString('#content>.c_row@html'));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|回复：.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n⛄【$1】');
result = intro + pl + r2
result = r2? result : intro
}else if(x==0){
	result = intro;
}
</js>

}
data;

bookSourceComment: 增加保存重定向后的域名到源变量，搜索时使用重定向后的域名进行搜索。 换源url时，先在右上角三个点 设置源变量里清空源变量再换源url。 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.6yydstxt226.com/ https://www.6yydstxt434.com/ https://www.6yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt234.com/ https://www.5yydstxt178.com/

bookSourceComment:
1.由于网站有验证机制，请将更多设置里的预下载设置为0，不要一次性缓存过多章节
2.需要登录，否则加载不了目录
3.网站如果被墙了，可以自行更换其它可用域名
常见问题解决办法：
1.刷新界面，登录验证
2.换网络换流量换vpn节点
3.清除缓存清除cookie清除web数据
可自行更改源域名：

header:
<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

\n?){2}/g,"

"); x(//g,""); try { // Aes解密 secret = src.match(/=\s*secret\(\s*['"](.+?)['"],[\s]*['"](.+?)['"],[^);]*?/); string = secret[1] code = java.md5Encode(secret[2]); iv = code.substring(0, 16); key = code.substring(16); //java.log(baseUrl + " Aes解密ok：" + code + "\n" + iv + "\n" + key) result = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding", key, iv).decryptStr(string); } catch (err) { try { // 乱序恢复 ns = java.base64Decode(src.match(/var ns='(.+?)';/)[1]).split(','); //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复ok") paragraphArr = result.split('

'); result = ""; for (i = 1; i <= paragraphArr.length; i++) { result += paragraphArr[ns[i] - ns[0]] + '

'; } } catch (err) { //java.log(baseUrl + "乱序恢复Aes解密no") } } //初始化图片链接 x(/[\r\n]?[\t ]*]+>[\t ]*[\r\n]?/g, "#$1#"); //初始化字体格式的文字,匹配 x(/(.*?)<\/i>/g, function(str, p1) { //java.log(p1.charCodeAt().toString(16)); //返回16进制，例：p1= 返回格式#e800# return '#' + p1.charCodeAt().toString(16) + '#' }) //转换空格 x(/ /g, ' '); //初始化分段准备 x(/[\t  ]{2,2}/g, "　"); //去掉标签里的属性 x(/(\<|<)([^\>]*?)(\s| )[^\>]*(\>|>)/g, "<$2>"); //段落换行 x(/\s*(\n|)+\s*(　{2,})?/gi, "\r\n"); //去掉不需要的标签 x(/([\r\n　]*\<\/?([A-Za-z]*)?\>[\r\n　]*)/gi, ""); //引号替换 x(/‘/g, "『"); x(/’/g, "』"); x(/“/g, "「"); x(/”/g, "」"); if (/(Undefined|(^\s*$))/.test(result)) { result = "

by天天的鸟蛋蛋
阅读云（sososhu）搜索系列+1

ruleSearch.author: span@text
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
if (result.match(/阅读云/)) {
   u = baseUrl.split(',')[0]
   cookie.removeCookie(u)
   // java.startBrowserAwait(u, "验证")
   java.webView(null, u, "document.cookie")
   ck = cookie.getCookie(u)
   head = JSON.stringify({ headers: { 'Cookie': ck } })
   url = u + "," + head
   result = java.ajax(url)
}
result
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
let v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
let x = v[2];
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: '数据解析失败: ',
        default: 'AJAX请求失败: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}

intro=info+`\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){

if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (result['match'](/正文内容已隐藏/)) { java['toast']('\n❗❗❗【抱歉，系统检测到访问异常，请输入验证码!】👻'); java.startBrowser(baseUrl,'验证') } if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); }} else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

⌚️ 时长：{{$.model.durationFormat}}

📆 日期：{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

🎥 播放：{{$.model.viewCount}}次

📩 收藏：{{$.model.collectCount}}

🕵 片商：{{$.model.authors}}

👤 上传：{{$.model.uploader}}

🔖 标签：{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

🏷 简介：{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 //java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 //java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=` + Date.now() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    //java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=` + Date.now() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
    
 data
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 let v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 let x = v[0];
let url = getUrl();
let ss;
let uri = `${url}api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`; //默认搜索小说

try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
java.log(ss.ss.statusCode())
java.log(String(Object.keys(ss)))
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.log(String(err))
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，更换域名💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
 book.type = 8;
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'游客✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/注册会员/g,'VIP💎'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'游客✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,'').replace(/注册会员/g,'VIP💎'),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    //java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
let url = `${getUrl()}`;
let uri=`data:;base64,辞晨,{"type":""}`;
try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword=${encodeURI(key)}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

bookSourceComment: 增加保存重定向后的域名到源变量，搜索时使用重定向后的域名进行搜索。 换源url时，先在右上角三个点 设置源变量里清空源变量再换源url。 增加自动验证，不行就手动登录，登录url要与源url一致。 解决目前新的字体格式文字显示的问题(例替换显示为'的')。 by812@221012 解决目前所见到的所有问题，包括页面解析、分页有的页面获取不到、图片转文字等问题，并对内容中出现的翻页断行、以前流行的35字换行排版、部分内容显示HTML源码、推广文字、广告等进行了恢复与过滤。 地址发布页(浏览器打开) https://zozozo.xyz/ http://www.diyibanzhu666.xyz 目前可用地址： https://www.6yydstxt226.com/ https://www.6yydstxt434.com/ https://www.6yydstxt426.com/ https://www.7yydstxt234.com/ https://www.5yydstxt178.com/

<js>
(() => {
	try {
		data = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())
	} catch (err) {
		data = {}
	}
	sessionID = data.sessionID||"";
	if (!sessionID) {
		chars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz123456789";
		charsLength = chars.length
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++) {
			sessionID += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * charsLength))
		}
		data.sessionID = sessionID
		source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(data))
	}
	return JSON.stringify({
		"cookie": "PHPSESSID=" + sessionID,
		"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 13_3_1 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/13.0.5 Mobile/15E148 Snapchat/10.77.5.59 (like Safari/604.1)"
	})
})()
</js>

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字].*?[】）\)]}}•{{@@[property$=update_time]@content##\s.*}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

\n?){2}/g,"

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString(".word_read@p@text",ml);
    java.toast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

只看楼主
◎编辑书籍详情页，在简介内容填上 【只看楼主】  保存，刷新书籍页（有已缓存的正文记得正文也要刷新）
◎内容只有楼主发帖，无作者名时间等
去空行
◎层与层之间有一行空行，不想要空行的话
◎就在书籍详情页的简介内容填上【去空行】
◎只看楼主跟去空行随便怎么写，写对字就行

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
chapterPageBeat = java.get("chapterPageBeat");
chapterUrl = java.get("chapterUrl");
chapterName = java.get("chapterName");

sourceUrl1 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1];
java.log(sourceUrl1);
sourceUrl2 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\/[\/a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1]
java.log(sourceUrl2);

if(chapterPageBeat!=""){
f=new RegExp(chapterPageBeat,"i");
cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").match(f)[1];
}
else{cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").replace(/>\s+</g, "><");}

var chapterList = [];
name = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterName,"g"));
url = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterUrl,"g"));

for(var i = 0; i < name.length; i ++){
text = name[i].match(chapterName)[1];
uri = url[i].match(chapterUrl)[1];

if(uri.indexOf("/") == -1){
	 	href=sourceUrl2 +"/"+ uri;
	 	}else{href = sourceUrl1 + uri;}
	 	href = href +","+ JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":href}})
	 	
chapterList.push({
		 	  text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
 }

chapterList
</js>

var hhekgvReg=RegExp(`\(hhekgv=|hhekgv=)+.*?([\s\S]*?).html("|');.*?`, 'g')
var hhekgv= (result.match(hhekgvReg) && result.match(hhekgvReg)[0]?result.match(hhekgvReg)[0]:"").replace(/\s+/g, '').replace(/hhekgv=|'|"|;/g,"")
if(hhekgv.includes("_")){
   result = hhekgv
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var dataArray= baseUrl.replace(".html","").split('/')
var aid = dataArray.find(n=>n.includes("bxwx_")).replace("bxwx_","")

var dataArray = []
if(baseUrl.includes(".html")){
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".ph_list")[1].select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
  href:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('href'),
})
})
}else{
 org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".duaejh").select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
 let id=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('onclick')).replace(/read_tz|\(|\)|;/g,"")
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
   href: `/chapter/${aid }/${id}.html`
  })
})
}
result = dataArray
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: p.author@text
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>
##更新 .*
ruleBookInfo.name: p.title@text
ruleBookInfo.tocUrl:
<js>
list=java.get('list').split('\n');
intro=String(book.intro);
customIntro=intro.match(/来源【(\d+)】/)[1];
cate = decodeURIComponent(list[customIntro].split("=")[1])
mulu = java.ajax(cate);
"https://"+java.toURL(cate).host + java.getString("text.查看全部章节@href",mulu)
</js>
